keel.Algorithms.Statistical_Classifiers.Shared.DiscrAnalysis

Class AD

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Statistical_Classifiers.Shared.DiscrAnalysis.AD

  • public class AD
extends java.lang.Object
    Linear and Quadratic discriminant analysis, with a normal distribution of the examples for each class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jose A. Saez Munoz

      • computeParameter

        public void computeParameter(boolean lineal)
                      throws ErrorDimension,
                             ErrorSingular
        Computes the different parameters for the algorithm where the DA will be used.
        Parameters:
        lineal - Lineal (True) or Quadratic (False) flag.
        Throws:
        ErrorDimension - Dimension matrix error.
        ErrorSingular - Sigular matrix error.

      • AlmacenaParametros

        public void AlmacenaParametros(double[] pesos)

      • RecuperaParametros

        public void RecuperaParametros(double[] pesos)
        Recovers the parameters of the LDA or QDA stored in the array given. This array should be filled by the method AlmacenaParametros
        Parameters:
        pesos - array given.
